trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hesperia

divs: Sighting DetailsMy date and I were heading to Vegas driveing north bound on Interstate 15 aboutone and a half miles befor Oak Hill RD. (Cajon Summit) when from out of thenorth droping out below the cloud celing was what I thought was a aircraft.Almost at the same time we saw comeing out of the west object #2. A blue-whitepin point. I said those planes are going hit each other. With a flash ofred-orange light thay joind into one. After 2 or 3 seconds thay seprated backinto 2 with onther flash of light. The blue-white pin point seemed to fade awayinto nothing while it went back the way it came from. At the same time object #1is getting brighter and brighter with an ice cream cone structuer clearlyvisable. And then all at once it blinks out and is gone. Total time about 30 to35 seconds. WOW!!!!
Summary: those planes are going hit each other
